sub_topic: Calculating the volume of a rectangular pyramid.
message_1: What is the volume of a rectangular pyramid with a length of 7 cm, a width of 5 cm, and a height of 9 cm? Round your answer to the nearest hundredth.
message_2:
To find the volume of a rectangular pyramid, we use the formula:

Volume = (1/3) × length × width × height

Plugging in the given values:

Volume = (1/3) × 7 cm × 5 cm × 9 cm

Volume = (1/3) × 315 cm³

Volume = 105 cm³

The volume of the rectangular pyramid is approximately 105 cm³.
